title: Navigator: requestMediaKeySystemAccess() method
summary:
The Navigator.requestMediaKeySystemAccess() method
  returns a Promise which delivers a MediaKeySystemAccess
  object that can be used to access a particular media key system, which can in turn be
  used to create keys for decrypting a media stream. This method is part of the Encrypted Media Extensions API, which brings support for encrypted media and DRM-protected video to the web.
pageTitle: Navigator: requestMediaKeySystemAccess() method - Web APIs | MDN
